title: Sorna Roman Villa and Church
description: Near Parentium (today Porec/Parenzo in Croatia), Cape Sorna (Zorna) first hosted a large villa maritima, and then a small early Christian church.

properties.description: Representative center point of visible archaeological remains according to AdriAtlas (based on, and verified with, imagery analysis in Google Earth).
properties.title: AdriAtlas Location Center of Visible Remains
